title: client issue
body: so my clients been havin this issue where every once and awhile the game will crash, and i'd have to restart, but when i tried to log back in, it would say 'incorrect password' for some unknown reason, and that it reverted to a previous patch or something, well i used the hextech whatever to fix it, and it seemed to work, so about a day later i launch a game, and it does it again, givin me a leaverbuster, and like, is there any way to revert that leaver buster, i'd prefer to not wait 100 minutes due to a client issue that was out of my control

replies.body:
I can't do much about leaverbusters, since your other teammates were still left to try and 4v5 their way out of that match. I still want to try and troubleshoot why your client is crashing to hopefully stop that from happening in the future. 

Typically game crashes like that are caused by some kind of bad hardware/software interaction, or possible corrupted game files. I'd suggest going through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if we can keep you on the Rift without crashing!
